001package com.github.tommyettinger.tantrum.regexodus;
002
003import org.apache.fory.Fory;
004import org.apache.fory.memory.BoundsChecking;
005import org.apache.fory.memory.MemoryBuffer;
006import org.apache.fory.memory.Platform;
007import org.apache.fory.serializer.Serializer;
008import regexodus.ds.CharBitSet;
009
010public class CharBitSetSerializer extends Serializer<CharBitSet> {
011    public CharBitSetSerializer(Fory fory) {
012        super(fory, CharBitSet.class, false);
013    }
014
015    @Override
016    public void write(final MemoryBuffer output, final CharBitSet data) {
017        final int[] bits = data.getRawBits();
018        output.writePrimitiveArrayWithSize(bits, Platform.INT_ARRAY_OFFSET, bits.length << 2);
019    }
020
021    @Override
022    public CharBitSet read(MemoryBuffer input) {
023        final CharBitSet obs = new CharBitSet();
024        obs.setRawBits(readIntsAndSize(input));
025        return obs;
026    }
027
028    /**
029     * This method should be used to read data written by
030     * {@link MemoryBuffer#writePrimitiveArrayWithSize(Object, int, int)}.
031     */
032    private static int[] readIntsAndSize(MemoryBuffer buffer) {
033        final int numBytes = buffer.readVarUint32();
034        int readerIdx = buffer.readerIndex();
035        final int size = buffer.size();
036        // use subtract to avoid overflow
037        if (BoundsChecking.BOUNDS_CHECKING_ENABLED && readerIdx > size - numBytes) {
038            throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(
039                    String.format(
040                            "readerIdx(%d) + length(%d) exceeds size(%d): %s", readerIdx, numBytes, size, buffer));
041        }
042        final int[] ints = new int[numBytes >>> 2];
043        Platform.copyMemory(
044                buffer.getHeapMemory(), buffer.getUnsafeAddress() + readerIdx, ints, Platform.INT_ARRAY_OFFSET, numBytes);
045        buffer._increaseReaderIndexUnsafe(numBytes);
046        return ints;
047    }
048
049}
